column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Thank you for bringing this to our attention
column2: Andy. We are sorry to hear about your disappointing experience with the calamari you received. Our management team would love the opportunity to discuss this with you more directly. Please click the link to fill out the corresponding information and our management team will be in contact with you. Again
column3: thank you for your feedback and we greatly appreciate you bringing it to our attention. We are looking forward to hearing from you.
